comment.text: This translation key is used to display a success message when a storage quota is successfully set. It is commonly displayed in dialogs and notifications after updating storage quotas, ensuring users are informed of the successful completion of the operation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Yaddaş kvotası uğurla təyin olundu' is not the most natural or idiomatic way to say 'Storage quota successfully set' in Azerbaijani. While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing such as 'Yaddaş kvotası müvəffəqiyyətlə təyin edildi' or 'Saxlanma kvotası uğurla təyin edildi.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Limit pamięci został pomyślnie ustawiony' literally translates to 'Memory limit was successfully set.' While understandable, 'Storage quota' implies something more than just memory. It refers to a defined maximum allowance for data storage, which is not fully captured by 'Limit pamięci'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Limit przestrzeni dyskowej został pomyślnie ustawiony.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Limită de stocare este stabilită cu succes' is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English phrase 'Storage quota successfully set.' It sounds a bit clunky in Romanian. A more natural phrasing would convey the success more directly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cota de stocare a fost stabilită cu succes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ආචයන සලාකය සැකසිණි' does not accurately convey the meaning of 'Storage quota successfully set.'. 'ආචයන' is not a standard word and 'සලාකය' implies something like 'slice' or 'portion'. The phrase doesn't fit the context of setting a storage quota.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like 'ගබඩාවේ ඉඩ ප්‍රමාණය සාර්ථකව සකස් කරන ලදි' (Gabadavaye ida pramaṇaya sārthaka saṅgrahē saṅkasakaraṇa ladi) or 'ගබඩාවේ ප්‍රමාණය සැකසිණි' (Gabadavaye pramaṇaya saṅgrahē saṅgrahē saṅgrahē saṅgrahē

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Складишна квота успешно постављена.' is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the intended meaning. 'Складишна' literally means 'storage' (as in, warehouse) rather than 'storage quota'.
The word 'skladišna' is spelled correctly, but a more common and natural phrasing would be 'Uspešno postavljena skladišna kvota.'
